lowa 05 wani tharangakari aarthikayata himikam kiyana dhanawath rate nayakaya wuwada mak hama dinakama siya niwase sita agamathi karyalaya wetha yam eem karanne thama push bayisikalayeni. 2012 di iranaye polispathiwaraya siya rate niyojitha pirisak samanga nedarlanthayata giya awasthawe, agamathi mak rut kisidu aarakshaka bhatayek nomathiwa sayikalayen karyalaya wetha paminenu daka wishmayata path wiya. 2018 juni 04 dina ohu athin ohuge kopi koppaya nedarlantha parlimenthuwa thuladi gilihi giya pasu, ethana siti pirisidu karana sewikawage ‘mop eka’ gena kshanikawa bima pirisidu kara damimata mak kriya kaleya.
